title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official CLI and Python library for running large language models locally with minimal setup.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official PyPI package providing Python bindings to interact with the Ollama API.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama, published on npm.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration allowing Ollama models as LLM backends for chains and agents.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Community-built web UI (now renamed open-webui) for chatting with Ollama models.

title: open-webui
summary: Successor to ollama-webui; feature-rich self-hosted WebUI for Ollama and OpenAI-compatible APIs.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client library for Ollama, available on Maven Central.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal retrieval-augmented generation example using Ollama embeddings and llama-cpp-python.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack 2.x integration to use Ollama models as generators or embedders in pipelines.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that brings Ollama models into GitHub Copilot-like inline suggestions.

title: ollama-cli-chat
summary: Rust-based TUI chat client for Ollama with conversation history and markdown rendering.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord bot that streams Ollama model responses into guild channels.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Community-maintained Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes clusters.

title: ollama-nvidia-docker
summary: Official container images with CUDA support for GPU-accelerated inference.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Unofficial Rust crate providing typed async bindings to the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET SDK for Ollama with chat, embeddings, and vision model support.

title: ollama-rag-langchain-streamlit
summary: Streamlit app template combining Ollama, LangChain, and Chroma for PDF Q&A.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that lets users query local Ollama models from within notes.

title: ollama-slack-bot
summary: Slack Bolt app that exposes Ollama models as slash commands and threaded replies.

title: ollama-digitalocean-1-click
summary: DigitalOcean 1-Click App image that spins up a GPU droplet with Ollama pre-installed.
